mapper.select: select id,name,gender,age,duty,telephone,id_card as idCard,address,remark,addon from employee where id=#{id} and delete_flag=0
mapper.update:
update employee
name=#{name},
gender=#{gender},
age=#{age},
duty=#{duty},
telephone=#{telephone},
id_card=#{idCard},
address=#{address},
remark=#{remark},
where id = #{id}
update employee e inner join administrator a on e.id=a.id set e.deleteon=now(),e.deleteby=1, e.delete_flag=1,a.deleteon=now(),a.deleteby=1,a.delete_flag=1 where e.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,name,gender,duty,telephone,address,addon from employee where (#{name}=null or name like concat("%",#{name},"%")) and (#{telephone}=null or telephone like concat("%",#{telephone},"%"))
